intro:
Get ready for kick-off in Zumba – Soccer Marble League!
Match and blast marbles before they reach the goal!
Unlock power plays and climb the league ladder!
description:
Zumba – Soccer Marble League kicks off a thrilling twist on marble shooters—packed with stadium lights, roaring crowds, and nonstop soccer action! Step into the cleats of your marble-blasting captain and stop the rush before the marbles hit the goal.
Select your match, aim with precision, and shoot to create chains of three or more matching marbles. Timing is key—don’t let the ball-line score! Master skill shots, combo explosions, and rapid clears to earn high scores and climb through the leagues.
Unlock powerful soccer-style power-ups like Power Shot, Time-Out, Formation Reset, Turbo Boost, and Precision Kick to control the pace and turn the match in your favor. Every ten levels unlocks a new stadium: from Rookie Fields and Urban Arenas to International Domes and the Finals of Fame—each with its own unique challenge.
